author: daniellehrner
content: In case it does not have to be a clique network: Besu offers two alternative production ready PoA consensus algorithms, IBFT2 and QBFT.

author: _shemnon
content: Implementing 3436 in Geth or nethermind should prevent Goreli from spontaneously halting.  Only half the clients need to follow the same fork choice rule, and adding one more client to the list supporitng 3436 should get the majority of goerli on it.

author: _shemnon
content: I think QBFT would be a better choice over IBFT2, because Quorum also supports it making it multi-client.  But there is a different set of networking calls needed to keep a BFT consensus moving forward, the consensus nodes are a bit more tightly coupled.
